app.revision_history: Fixed create_combined_mig_io_design test to resolve issue with Core Container
app.name: designutils
app.summary: This is a collection of scripts and utility application that are grouped by relevance to querying and analyzing a logical design, principally around the netlist object model.

proc.name: bisect_pblock
proc.summary: bisect a P block

proc.name: check_cdc_paths
proc.summary: checks all the Cross Domain Crossing paths for typical issues

proc.name: clone_cell
proc.summary: Clone a cell and connects all the clone input pins to the master input pins. Run after synthesis

proc.name: clone_net_driver
proc.summary: Clone the driver cell of a net. Run after synthesis

proc.name: convert_muxfx_to_luts
proc.summary: Replaces MUXFX cells with LUT3 cells in an open synthesized design

proc.name: create_combined_mig_io_design
proc.summary: Creates a new project instantiating the given MIG IP into a single design for IO pin planning

proc.name: create_diff_ports
proc.summary: Creates differential _N port for each _P port in a pinplanning design

proc.name: generate_runs
proc.summary: Create all possible combinations of runs

proc.name: get_clock_interaction
proc.summary: Return a specific string within the clock interaction report

proc.name: get_connected_ref_pins
proc.summary: Return a list of reference pins connected to the pin

proc.name: get_data_through_pins
proc.summary: Return the data pins of a single timing path

proc.name: get_host_platform
proc.summary: return the host platform (windows|unix)

proc.name: get_inter_slr_nets
proc.summary: get all the inter-SLR nets

proc.name: get_leaf_cells
proc.summary: get all the leave cells below an instance

proc.name: get_mem
proc.summary: queries the kernel for current heap memory of Vivado session

proc.name: get_pid_mem
proc.summary: queries the kernel for the heap memory of a specific process

proc.name: get_sll_nets
proc.summary: get routed inter-SLR nets that have a VLONG12 cost and over 100 wire shapes on at least one of its nodes

proc.name: get_sll_nodes
proc.summary: returns all the sll node objects in the device for matching SLRs

proc.name: gets_regexp
proc.summary: returns the next line that matches occurrence of a regular expression in the file

proc.name: highlight_enable_signal_sites
proc.summary: highlight the destination sites of the enable signals reported by report_control_set command

proc.name: insert_buffer
proc.summary: insert a buffer or any 2-pins cell on a net or a pin

proc.name: insert_buffer_chain
proc.summary: insert a chain of buffers or any 2-pins cells on a net or a pin

proc.name: insert_clock_probe
proc.summary: insert a clock probe to the design and connect the probe to an output port. The output should not exist and is created by the command

proc.name: is_fabric_connected
proc.summary: Determine if the given pin is connected to a SLICE. For input pins, check just the driver. For output pins, check all loads

proc.name: prettyTable
proc.summary: utility to easily create and print tables

proc.name: read_file_regexp
proc.summary: returns all lines that match occurrence of a regular expression in the file

proc.name: reapply_iostandard
proc.summary: this command queries the tool-chosen defaults from implementation and "apply" them so it looks like the user did it from the beginning. This complies with the bit export restriction that all ios be LOCd and explicitly set to an IO Standard

proc.name: remove_buffer
proc.summary: remove a buffer or any 2-pins cell

proc.name: rename_net
proc.summary: rename a local net name

proc.name: replicate_high_fanout_registers
proc.summary: Replicate registers to limit register fanout to maxFan. Run after synthesis

proc.name: report_all_primitives
proc.summary: reports all primitives (LIB_CELL) in the design

proc.name: report_cells_fanout
proc.summary: report the fanout of cells matching a REF_NAME pattern

proc.name: report_cells_loc
proc.summary: report the location of cells matching a REF_NAME pattern

proc.name: report_critical_hfn
proc.summary: report timing critical high fanout nets based on fanout and slack

proc.name: report_hier_util
proc.summary: report the cell utilization below hierarchical instances

proc.name: report_parts
proc.summary: report all the available parts that match a pattern

proc.name: source_path
proc.summary: source a script from a choice of paths

proc.name: timing_report_to_verilog
proc.summary: Convert timing paths to a Verilog structural netlist

proc.name: verilog2int
proc.summary: Convert a Verilog formatted number into an integer

proc.name: write_ip_integrator_testbench
proc.summary: Create a testbench for an IP Integrator design and optionally add it to the current project

proc.name: write_loc_constraints
proc.summary: Creates a constraints file with the specified design LOCs

proc.name: write_slr_pblock_xdc
proc.summary: Exports the current SLR placement to pblock constraints in an XDC file

proc.name: write_template
proc.summary: generates a Verilog/VHDL stub or instanciation template for the current design in memory (current_instance)
